channel.title: Posts on Virtualistic Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Virtualistic Blog

item.title: How to reinstall a Single ESXi Host Running Your vCenter
item.description: Some quick notes on how I reinstalled my homeserver from 6.7 to 7 without losing any VM configuration

item.title: Codewars Solution Arraydiff
item.description: A solution to an Arraydif challenge on codewars (in python).

item.title: Installing Pritunl on Redhat 8
item.description: A quick write-up on installing Pritunl on RedHat 8.

item.title: Script to convert VM readytime from milliseconds to percentage
item.description: Created a small script to quickly convert the CPU Ready time view of a VM shown in milliseconds to percentage per vCPU

item.title: Welcome Back
item.description: Welcome back, Quite some time has passed since I got tired of fighting off hackers from my previous wordpress site. I’ve been seeing more and more people move to HUGO to create content and publish it to Github so I decided to give it a shot. Will try to figure out how I’m going to use this space as we go. Everything I write is my own.
